title: Suggestion for friend status

embed.description: ibanezs470dx uploaded this image to 'League'. See the album on Photobucket.

body:
Possibly, instead of having the tiny circle status icons that no one can see on a normal sized monitor; colour the whole bar of their name using green for online (not away), red for do not disturb, yellow for away, yellow for ingame (or possibly a different colour). Some examples above with my crappy photoshop skills.

And some below because multiple links are too hard to do:

Red: 

http://i1338.photobucket.com/albums/o696/ibanezs470dx/League/League%20of%20legends%20Friendlist%20Red_zpsvulphdvy.jpg

Yellow: 

http://i1338.photobucket.com/albums/o696/ibanezs470dx/League/League%20of%20legends%20Friendlist%20Yellow_zpsr1zj1ql7.jpg



Obviously it won't look exactly as bad as that but imho it'll look nice in the new client... better than dreary dark theme with the occasional blue accent. Also would be more functional than that tiny icon. The option to turn it off would also be nice to have for the people that don't want it.
